content: Ever since #77451, rustbot has been marking PRs with the 1.49 milestone when in fact they should be marked with the 1.48 milestone up until the beta branch. I'm not sure if there's an easy way to fix this, but it's kind of confusing.
Oh darn, some stuff just merged that I was hoping to get in the next beta. Oh well :/
Alright, well glad at least that it's not a bug :)
If they are bug fixes, you can nominate them for backport. Features should just ride the next release train.

I think they're mostly features or minor bug fixes (e.g. error messages), so they shouldn't be backported. I thought that the branch was from Monday; I didn't realize that the branch is from earlier (I think Friday in this case), but is created on Monday.
this is the first release cycle we've done this
